meaning: savings, store, lay in, keep, wear mustache

onyomiExamples.meaning: putting money aside, savings, deposit (e.g. in a bank), accumulated surplus of wins, wins in the bank

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to store, to save up, to stock up on, to lay in stock, to set aside, to accumulate (e.g. knowledge), to build up (e.g. experience), to develop (e.g. one's skills), to grow (a beard, moustache, etc.), to wear
